title: Djokovic's Quest for a Record 25th Grand Slam Title
summary: Novak Djokovic, a 38-year-old tennis champion, is aiming to win his 25th Grand Slam title, which would break the all-time record he currently shares with Margaret Court at 24 wins. He is competing in the Australian Open, where he has a strong history with 10 men's championships, making it his best opportunity this season. Despite recent signs of decline, Djokovic reached the semi-finals in all four Grand Slams last year. He emphasizes that he does not view this as a 'now or never' situation, instead focusing on his past successes to reduce pressure. Seeded fourth, he starts against Pedro Martinez, and while he desires the record, he appreciates his career achievements. The article highlights his mindset and the challenges of aging in professional sports.
